extensions.name: Address group
extensions.description: Support address group

extensions.name: Address scope
extensions.description: Address scopes extension.

extensions.name: agent
extensions.description: The agent management extension.

extensions.name: Allowed Address Pairs
extensions.description: Provides allowed address pairs

extensions.name: Auto Allocated Topology Services
extensions.description: Auto Allocated Topology Services.

extensions.name: Availability Zone
extensions.description: The availability zone extension.

extensions.name: Default Subnetpools
extensions.description: Provides ability to mark and use a subnetpool as the default.

extensions.name: DNS Integration
extensions.description: Provides integration with DNS.

extensions.name: dns_domain for ports
extensions.description: Allows the DNS domain to be specified for a network port.

extensions.name: DNS domain names with keywords allowed
extensions.description: Allows to use keywords like <project_id>, <project_name>, <user_id> and <user_name> as DNS domain name

extensions.name: Neutron external network
extensions.description: Adds external network attribute to network resource.

extensions.name: Neutron Extra DHCP options
extensions.description: Extra options configuration for DHCP. For example PXE boot options to DHCP clients can be specified (e.g. tftp-server, server-ip-address, bootfile-name)

extensions.name: Neutron Extra Route
extensions.description: Extra routes configuration for L3 router

extensions.name: Filter parameters validation
extensions.description: Provides validation on filter parameters.

extensions.name: Floating IP Port Details Extension
extensions.description: Add port_details attribute to Floating IP resource

extensions.name: Neutron Service Flavors
extensions.description: Flavor specification for Neutron advanced services.

extensions.name: Floating IP Pools Extension
extensions.description: Provides a floating IP pools API.

extensions.name: Neutron L3 Router
extensions.description: Router abstraction for basic L3 forwarding between L2 Neutron networks and access to external networks via a NAT gateway.

extensions.name: Neutron L3 Configurable external gateway mode
extensions.description: Extension of the router abstraction for specifying whether SNAT should occur on the external gateway

extensions.name: Multi Provider Network
extensions.description: Expose mapping of virtual networks to multiple physical networks

extensions.name: Network MTU
extensions.description: Provides MTU attribute for a network resource.

extensions.name: Network MTU (writable)
extensions.description: Provides a writable MTU attribute for a network resource.

extensions.name: Network Availability Zone
extensions.description: Availability zone support for network.

extensions.name: Network IP Availability
extensions.description: Provides IP availability data for each network and subnet.

extensions.name: Pagination support
extensions.description: Extension that indicates that pagination is enabled.

extensions.name: Port device profile
extensions.description: Expose the port device profile (Cyborg)

extensions.name: Neutron Port MAC address regenerate
extensions.description: Network port MAC address regenerate

extensions.name: Port NUMA affinity policy
extensions.description: Expose the port NUMA affinity policy

extensions.name: Port Resource Request
extensions.description: Expose resource request to Port

extensions.name: Port Resource Request Groups
extensions.description: Support requesting multiple groups of resources and traits from the same RP subtree in resource_request

extensions.name: Port Binding
extensions.description: Expose port bindings of a virtual port to external application

extensions.name: Port Bindings Extended
extensions.description: Expose port bindings of a virtual port to external application

extensions.name: Port Security
extensions.description: Provides port security

extensions.name: project_id field enabled
extensions.description: Extension that indicates that project_id field is enabled.

extensions.name: Provider Network
extensions.description: Expose mapping of virtual networks to physical networks

extensions.name: Quality of Service
extensions.description: The Quality of Service extension.

extensions.name: Direction for QoS bandwidth limit rule
extensions.description: Allow to configure QoS bandwidth limit rule with specific direction: ingress or egress

extensions.name: Ingress direction for QoS minimum bandwidth rule
extensions.description: Allow to configure QoS minumum bandwidth rule with ingress direction.

extensions.name: QoS default policy
extensions.description: Expose the QoS default policy per project

extensions.name: Floating IP QoS
extensions.description: The floating IP Quality of Service extension

extensions.name: QoS port network policy ID
extensions.description: Adds a the QoS network ID to the port definition

extensions.name: QoS minimum packet rate rule
extensions.description: Allow to configure QoS minimum packet rate rule.

extensions.name: QoS minimum packet rate rule alias
extensions.description: API to enable GET, PUT and DELETE operations on QoS minimum packet rate rule without specifying policy ID

extensions.name: QoS Rule Type Packet per Second Extension
extensions.description: Add QoS Rule Type Packet per Second

extensions.name: Details of QoS rule types
extensions.description: Expose details about QoS rule types supported by loaded backend drivers

extensions.name: Quality of Service rules alias API
extensions.description: API to enable GET, PUT and DELETE operations on QoS policy rules without specifying policy ID

extensions.name: Quota engine limit check
extensions.description: Support for checking the resource usage before applying a new quota limit

extensions.name: Quota management support
extensions.description: Expose functions for quotas management per project

extensions.name: Quota details management support
extensions.description: Expose functions for quotas usage statistics per project

extensions.name: RBAC Policies
extensions.description: Allows creation and modification of policies that control tenant access to resources.

extensions.name: Add address_scope type to RBAC
extensions.description: Add address_scope type to RBAC

extensions.name: Add security_group type to network RBAC
extensions.description: Add security_group type to network RBAC

extensions.name: If-Match constraints based on revision_number
extensions.description: Extension indicating that If-Match based on revision_number is supported.

extensions.name: Resource revision numbers
extensions.description: This extension will display the revision number of neutron resources.

extensions.name: Router Availability Zone
extensions.description: Availability zone support for router.

extensions.name: Normalized CIDR field for security group rules
extensions.description: Add new field with normalized remote_ip_prefix cidr in SG rule

extensions.name: Remote address group id field for security group rules
extensions.description: Add new field of remote address group id in SG rules

extensions.name: Security group filtering on the shared field
extensions.description: Support filtering security groups on the shared field

extensions.name: security-group
extensions.description: The security groups extension.

extensions.name: Neutron Service Type Management
extensions.description: API for retrieving service providers for Neutron advanced services

extensions.name: Sorting support
extensions.description: Extension that indicates that sorting is enabled.

extensions.name: standard-attr-description
extensions.description: Extension to add descriptions to standard attributes

extensions.name: Stateful security group
extensions.description: Indicates if the security group is stateful or not

extensions.name: Subnet DNS publish fixed IP
extensions.description: Support choosing to publish DNS records for IPs from a subnet

extensions.name: Subnet service types
extensions.description: Provides ability to set the subnet service_types field

extensions.name: Subnet Allocation
extensions.description: Enables allocation of subnets from a subnet pool

extensions.name: Tag support for resources with standard attribute: port, subnet, subnetpool, network, security_group, router, floatingip, policy, trunk, network_segment_range
extensions.description: Enables to set tag on resources with standard attribute.

extensions.name: Resource timestamps
extensions.description: Adds created_at and updated_at fields to all Neutron resources that have Neutron standard attributes.

extensions.name: Trunk Extension
extensions.description: Provides support for trunk ports

extensions.name: Trunk port details
extensions.description: Expose trunk port details
